sources.title: Everything is Thunder
sources.description: “Forgotten little gem” (IMDB review quote). Wartime romance and intrigue in this British suspense thriller staring two American imports, Constance Bennett and Douglas Montgomery. The production values are first-rate and so is the the supporting cast. IMDB rating 6.2. Directed by Milton Rosmer. Released in 1936. Complete Print (PAL transfer). AKA “Cocktail de Celos” PERSONAL NOTE: I have no idea what the title means either.

metadata.Plot: During the first world war a Canadian officer escapes from a prison camp and reaches Berlin where he and a streetwalker plan to reach Holland.
metadata.Writer: Marion Dix, J.L. Hardy, J.O.C. Orton
metadata.Actors: Constance Bennett, Douglass Montgomery, Oscar Homolka
